tool_description: Creates optimal soil sampling strategies based on field characteristics, crop requirements, and testing objectives to ensure representative sample collection.

crop_type.description: Primary crop to be grown (e.g., corn, wheat, soybeans, tomatoes)

field_variability.description: Expected soil variability level: uniform, moderate, high

error_messages: Invalid field area: Field area must be greater than 0 acres.
Unsupported crop type: Provide a valid crop name or common agricultural crop.
Invalid variability level: Use uniform, moderate, or high.
Invalid sampling depth: Depth must be between 4-24 inches.
usage: Specify field_area_acres and crop_type to generate a sampling plan. Optionally set field_variability and sampling_depth for customized recommendations.

sample_locations.description: GPS coordinates or field positions for each sample
